pr_title: Separate REST Data Panache controller from resource

timeline.bodyText: So why not return a List<Person>?
timeline.author: FroMage

timeline.bodyText:
Isn't it List<Person>?
Also it feels weird that these are Page and Sort when the generated code you showed up there uses int and String, is it normal?
timeline.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText: Yes, it's List<Person> my bad. I think I'll rewrite the doc to clarify the differences better.
replies.author: gytis

timeline.bodyText: We end up returning a boolean response?
timeline.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText: Yes. Since I separated the RestDataResource implementation from a JAX-RS resource I decided to add a return value to the delete method so that a JAX-RS resource would know whether an entity was deleted or not and return either 204 or 404 response.
replies.author: gytis
